Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes the crime of making a terroristic threat against a police officer
Summary: Establishes the crime of making a terroristic threat against a police officer; makes such crime a class C felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of making a terroristic threat against a police officer
